title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with shoulder scales and cavalry forage cap] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with shoulder scales and cavalry forage cap] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.5 x 6.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-393. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: The Horse Soldier, Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, 2004. Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--1860-1870.
